Selfies on an audio cassette? Videos on a PC screen? Art on a skate deck? Try the new SCLPTR masks: MIXTAPE, PC, BOARD. Control the foreshortening of the model with your face, and then turn the result into pixel art using the new powerful PIXELS filter.<b

Selfies on an audio cassette? Videos on a PC screen? Art on a skate deck? Try the new SCLPTR masks: MIXTAPE, PC, BOARD. Control the foreshortening of the model with your face, and then turn the result into pixel art using the new powerful PIXELS filter.<b

Thank you for your support and reviews. We appreciate all of your feedback and work hard to make our app even better.
This updated version features:
• Bug fixes and stability improvements.
• We brought back the old SORT filter.

Thank you for your support and reviews. We appreciate all of your feedback and work hard to make our app even better.
This updated version features:
• Bug fixes and stability improvements.
• We brought back the old SORT filter.

Face filters are so last decade. It's time to change the game.
• Use our new SCLPTRs in AR or mix them with your content to create outstanding TikTok and Instagram stories
• Try brand new PHOTO filters with authentic hardcore glitches: JPG and PNG<
